trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Tucker
There was one other sighting in Tucker on or around September 20th 2005
Summary: I saw a triangle bright like light builbs white all around it;to bright to be a airplane.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting ready for bed, I looked out my back to see it everything was ok. I looked up and there it was traveling accross. It was so bright It hurt my eyes. I watched it travel behind trees. Then I went to my bedroom and looked out I saw the back of it. It was very low. I don't remember hearing any noise. It was as big as a 747.maybe bigger.it did not blink it was solid.silver and white.
